title: Remember Fasted and Low Carb Training? Why the Peloton Is Turning Its Back on Froome-Era Fueling
content:
'Different rules dominate the cycling world from before': The raw power and wild aggression of modern racing is pushing the fat-burning efficiency of low carb training down the agenda.

Read the full article at Remember Fasted and Low Carb Training? Why the Peloton Is Turning Its Back on Froome-Era Fueling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
